questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
no The image shows an old man painting at an easel but not splattering paint and he is not wearing a fabric smock.
no There is no young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image.
no The image does not present both an old man in a smock splattering paint and a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles; it only features an old man painting.
no The old man is wearing a patterned shirt, not a smock, so the material cannot be determined as fabric based on this image.
no The image does not contain any goggles, wooden or otherwise.
